title: Red and the Roofers
description: Dale Jackson leaves Sally behind and continues on his journey, unable to face his feelings or the reality of his life. Dale takes a job roofing for Tom Sanders to help support his growing drug and alcohol habits.They get a job working for Jim and Angie Worthington. Angie wants to surprise Jim when he gets back from a business trip with a new roof. Will she get more than a new roof with Dale and Tom?This story contains graphic sex. Please read at your own discretion. This is Book 2 of the Dale Jackson Series.
author: J.D. Anders
